SNACKBAR.MESSAGE_SUBMIT_ERROR: An error occurred. Please, try again.

ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION1: FairAI was founded by three software engineers who have been passionate about AI since they began their degrees in 2016.
ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION2: While working in banking, logistics, and telecom, they noticed that the way knowledge was captured, stored, and shared was highly inefficient, even within some of the world's leading organizations.
ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION3: This problem became even more apparent in the manufacturing industry, where operational know-how is often undocumented and siloed.
ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION4: With that mission, they started FairAI in 2023. Backed by Techstars and international investors, and having published research papers on the topic, they now help manufacturing teams improve operational efficiency by up to 10x by making expert know-how accessible across the organization.

CONTACT_SECTION.SECTION_DESCRIPTION: Together we can research ways and ideas that can massively improve the overall operating efficiency of your company.

CARD1.TITLE: Sell smarter, not harder.
CARD1.DESCRIPTION: Find new leads automatically while you focus on what you do best.
CARD1.DESCRIPTION2: Stay ahead of competitors with real-time market insight.
CARD1.DESCRIPTION3: Save time with personalised, automated emails.

CARD2.TITLE: Bring all your knowledge into one place.
CARD2.DESCRIPTION: Gather your files in a single trusted space so nothing gets lost.
CARD2.DESCRIPTION2: Find what you need quickly and keep your work moving.
CARD2.DESCRIPTION3: Collaborate with your team without wasting time searching.

CARD3.TITLE: Technology that grows with your business.
CARD3.DESCRIPTION: Your system becomes smarter over time.
CARD3.DESCRIPTION2: It adapts to your workflows and improves insights with every use.

CARD1.TITLE: Let's do a quick meeting?
CARD1.SUBTITLE: Choose a time that works for you.

CARD2.TITLE: Not ready for a call? Send us a message.
CARD2.SUBTITLE: We'll respond to you shortly, typically within a few hours.

CONTACT_FORM_INPUTS.MESSAGEPLACEHOLDER: How can we help? Fell free to share any details.

WHAT_WE_DO_SECTION.TITLE: Maximize Your Manufacturing Potential
WHAT_WE_DO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: FairAI enables you to accelerate sales and R&D by accessing your hard-earned insights from previous factory floor experiments with AI.

CARD1.TITLE: Stop Losing Data
CARD1.DESCRIPTION: Automatically capture every detail from projects, meetings, and proposals so historical pricing, win/loss reasons, and customer patterns are never lost again.
CARD1.DESCRIPTION2: Spot opportunities early instead of chasing them late.
CARD1.DESCRIPTION3: Make confident decisions without digging through spreadsheets or documents.

CARD2.TITLE: Turn Reports Into Action
CARD2.DESCRIPTION: Centralize and analyze production, quality, and financial reports with AI that extracts insights you can act on. Move from unread documents to real, quantified improvement opportunities.
CARD2.DESCRIPTION2: No more wasted time on manual entry or scattered notes.
CARD2.DESCRIPTION3: Teams get the operational clarity they need in seconds, not hours.

CARD3.TITLE: Bring Your Knowledge to Life
CARD3.DESCRIPTION: Transform your company’s know-how into evolving, searchable intelligence. Our AI learns and improves with existing knowledge, so your processes get better with every project.
CARD3.DESCRIPTION2: There are no subscriptions or recurring fees. You get a solution you can rely on without being locked into someone else's platform.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Never Lose Critical Know-How Again
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Retain what matters, even when people are absent.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Keep track of key decisions and why things were built the way they were.

Avoid lost context and repeated mistakes by making knowledge available beyond the people who originally held it.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Don't waste time on reports
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Sales teams lose time every week gathering data instead of acting on it.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Your data is automatically structured, analyzed, and clearly presented.

Less time on repetitive tasks, more focus on strategic decisions.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Quoting shouldn't take this long
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Elaborating a proposal shouldn't feel like starting from scratch every time.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Avoid the chaos of disorganized folders and scattered notes.

Our technology automatically indexes your team's content, making everything easy to find, share, and reuse without manual effort.

HERO_HEADLINE: Make every piece of knowledge work for you

FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE1: Automated data capture across projects, reports, and documents
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE1DESCRIPTION: Automatically collect and organize data from every project, report, and document—eliminating manual entry and ensuring consistent, up-to-date information across your entire workflow.
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE2DESCRIPTION: Turn complex data into clear, actionable insights with AI-driven dashboards that highlight trends, flag risks, and support smarter, faster decision-making.
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE3: Knowledge repository for process, pricing, and operational history
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE3DESCRIPTION: Centralize your organization's knowledge in one searchable hub—capturing processes, pricing models, and operational history so teams can work with clarity and confidence.
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE4: Integrations with ERP and CRM systems
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE4DESCRIPTION: Connect seamlessly with your existing ERP and CRM platforms to unify workflows, reduce duplication, and maintain a single source of truth across the business.
FEATURES_SECTION.FEATURE5DESCRIPTION: Enable distributed teams to work together in real time with enterprise-grade security, controlled access, and shared workspaces designed for cross-location collaboration.

HOW_TO.STEP1: 1. Connect your existing ERP or CRM and upload historical files
HOW_TO.STEP2: 2. If you don't have any kind of data, we help you obtain what is missing
HOW_TO.STEP3: 3. AI ingests and structures all past and current data
HOW_TO.STEP4: 4. Get dashboards, opportunities, and process insights instantly
HOW_TO.STEP5: 5. Let your AI learn all these insights and train your team so you can expand globally with confidence
